Ikigai Generate your ikigai automatically Draw your ikigai Erase Image Set Color Red Green Blue Color Erase Drawing Erase the drawing? Choose Color Draw your ikigai Ok Cancel Options Circle 1 Color Circle 2 Color Circle 3 Color Circle 4 Color worlds need good at love paid for passion mission profession vocation generated automatically Verify Ikigai Edit texts Yes No Delete drawing Do you really want to delete this drawing? select the color is an Ikigai It is not an ikigai. Because has no intersection between the circle and circle The Ikigai drawing should contain 4 intersecting circles. 
When drawing a circle, do not remove your finger from the screen until drawing is complete (every circle is considered complete from the moment you remove your finger from the screen, Any different shape of a circle will be treated as a circle) 
After the 4 circles have been finalized, the ikigai check will be done automatically. 
Click "Ok" to start drawing >
